title: Pixel 2 XL usb-c earbuds no longer connecting and only being recognised as a charging device.
content:
I tried to listen to some music today by plugging in my Google Brand usb-c earphone buds but these did not connect and the music comes out of the speakers instead. 
I have tried plugging in different headphones using the free Aux jax connector that came with my phone and the same occurs. 
I have restarted a few times and checked for any software updates but nothing has worked. 
Please help.
